page.title: 17Industry
page.content: In the village of Mochdre there are other industries.There is the {Diamond {Stylus}which is quite well known for making stylus' for record players.With the coming of the compact disc player we wonder about the future of such an industry. Another famous industry in Mochdre is{ {J.K.Smit & Sons(Diamond Tools)Ltd.} This company makes diamond core cable bits for rotary core drilling.These bits are at present being used for several site investigations for the proposed immersed tube tunnel under the Conwy Estuary.J.K.Smit's Technical Director John Holden commented"As a North Wales company ourselves,we are delighted that we have been able to play a part in this interesting project which is so important to communications along the North Wales Coast."
